thread.title: RIOT SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Riot Blockchain, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: RIOT SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Riot Blockchain, Inc.

organizations.name: board of directors of riot blockchain, inc

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Riot Blockchain, Inc. (“Riot Blockchain” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: RIOT) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/RIOT-Info-Request-Form-1830 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On October 4, 2017, the Company announced it was changing its name from Bioptix, Inc. to Riot Blockchain, Inc. and was shifting to an operator in blockchain technologies. Then on February 16, 2018, CNBC issued an investigative report examining issues within the Company, including allegations of insider selling, dilutive stock issuances, and the abrupt postponement of annual meetings. Following this news, shares of Riot Blockchain fell from a close of $17.20 per share on February 15, 2018, to a close of $11.46 per share on February 16, 2018.
To learn more about the investigation of Riot Blockchain contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/RIOT-Info-Request-Form-1830 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180223005540/en/
The Law Offices of Vincent Wong
